com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.phone

Interface Phone


  • public interface Phone
    Phone represents a Cisco Webex calling device.

    The application can obtain a phone object from Webex object and use phone to call other Cisco Webex users or PSTN when enabled.

    The phone must be registered before it can make or receive calls.

    Since:
    0.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Phone.AudioBRNMode
      The enumeration of audio BNR mode choices, default is HP.
      static class  Phone.DefaultBandwidth
      The enumeration of common bandwidth choices.
      static class  Phone.FacingMode
      The enumeration of Camera facing modes.
      static class  Phone.H264LicenseAction
      The options for H.264 video codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc
      static interface  Phone.IncomingCallListener
      The interface for a listener for incoming call
      static class  Phone.ServiceUrlType
      The enumeration of service url.
      static class  Phone.VideoStreamMode
      The enumeration of remote video stream.

        Set the listener to listen to the incoming call to this Phone.
        Since:
        0.1

      • getDefaultFacingMode

        Phone.FacingMode getDefaultFacingMode()
        Default camera facing mode of this phone, used as the default when dialing or answering a call. The default mode is the front camera.
        Since:
        0.1

      • setDefaultFacingMode

        void setDefaultFacingMode(Phone.FacingMode mode)
        Set default camera facing mode of this phone, used as the default when dialing or answering a call. The setting is not persistent.
        Since:
        0.1

      • register

        void register(@NonNull
              CompletionHandler<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Registers this phone to Cisco Webex cloud on behalf of the authenticated user.

        It also creates the websocket and connects to Cisco Webex cloud.

        Subsequent invocations of this method refresh the registration.

        Parameters:
        callback - A closure to be executed when completed, with error if the invocation is illegal or failed, otherwise nil.
        Since:
        0.1

      • deregister

        void deregister(@NonNull
                CompletionHandler<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Removes this *phone* from Cisco Webex cloud on behalf of the authenticated user.

        It also disconnects the websocket from Cisco Webex cloud.

        Subsequent invocations of this method behave as a no-op.

        Parameters:
        callback - A closure to be executed when completed, with error if the invocation is illegal or failed, otherwise nil.
        Since:
        0.1

      • dial

        void dial(@NonNull
          java.lang.String dialString,
          @NonNull
          MediaOption option,
          @NonNull
          CompletionHandler<Call> callback)
        Makes a call to an intended recipient on behalf of the authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        dialString - Intended recipient address in one of the supported formats.
        option - Intended media options - audio only or audio and video - for the call.
        callback - A closure to be executed when completed.
        Since:
        0.1

      • startPreview

        void startPreview(android.view.View view)
        Render a preview of the local party before the call is answered.
        Parameters:
        view - an UI view for rendering video.
        Since:
        0.1

      • stopPreview

        void stopPreview()
        Stop rendering the preview of the local party.
        Since:
        0.1

        callback - A closure to be executed when completed.
        Since:

      • disableVideoCodecActivation

        void disableVideoCodecActivation()
        Prevents the SDK from poping up an Alert for the end user to approve the use of H.264 video codec license from Cisco Systems, Inc.
        Since:

      • setAudioMaxRxBandwidth

        void setAudioMaxRxBandwidth(int bandwidth)
        Set the max receivning bandwidth for audio in unit bps for the call. Only effective if set before the start of call. if 0, default value of 64 * 1000 is used.
        Parameters:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_AUDIO.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • getAudioMaxRxBandwidth

        int getAudioMaxRxBandwidth()
        Return the current maximum receivning bandwidth of audio stream.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • setVideoMaxRxBandwidth

        void setVideoMaxRxBandwidth(int bandwidth)
        Set the max receiving bandwidth for video in unit bps for the call. Only effective if set before the start of call. if 0, default value of 2000*1000 is used.
        Parameters:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_90P, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_180P, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_360P, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_720P, or Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_1080P.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • getVideoMaxRxBandwidth

        int getVideoMaxRxBandwidth()
        Return the current maximum receiving bandwidth of video stream.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • setVideoMaxTxBandwidth

        void setVideoMaxTxBandwidth(int bandwidth)
        Set the max sending bandwidth for video in unit bps for the call. Only effective if set before the start of call. if 0, default value of 2000*1000 is used.
        Parameters:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_90P, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_180P, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_360P, Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_720P, or Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_1080P.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • getVideoMaxTxBandwidth

        int getVideoMaxTxBandwidth()
        Return the current maximum sending bandwidth of video stream.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • setSharingMaxRxBandwidth

        void setSharingMaxRxBandwidth(int bandwidth)
        Set the max receiving bandwidth for content sharing in unit bps for the call. Only effective if set before the start of call. if 0, default value of 4000*1000 is used.
        Parameters:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_SESSION.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • getSharingMaxRxBandwidth

        int getSharingMaxRxBandwidth()
        Return the current maximum receiving bandwidth of content sharing stream.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • isHardwareAccelerationEnabled

        boolean isHardwareAccelerationEnabled()
        Return True if Google hardware media codec is turned on for video. Otherwise, false.
        Since:
        2.1.1

      • setHardwareAccelerationEnabled

        void setHardwareAccelerationEnabled(boolean enable)
        Turn on/off Google hardware media codec for video. By doing hardware codec, android devices can do high definition (720p@30fps) video calls, but please note, since the hardware codec is high depend on android devices, some devices support hardware codec not very well.
        Parameters:
        enable - True to turn on Google hardware media codec. Otherwise, use OpenH264 software codec.
        Since:
        2.1.1

      • enableAudioEnhancementForModels

        void enableAudioEnhancementForModels(java.util.List<java.lang.String> models)
        Turn on audio enhancement for the specified device models. By default, the audio enhancement is enable for Samsung S7/S7Edge/S8/S8+/S9/S9+/S10/S10+/S10e/Note8/Note9.
        Parameters:
        models - the list of device models, if the list is null or empty, turn off the audio enhancement.
        Since:
        2.3.0

void setAudioMaxBandwidth(int bandwidth)

        Parameters:
        bandwidth - the suggest value could be Phone.DefaultBandwidth.MAX_BANDWIDTH_AUDIO.
        Since:
        1.3.0

int getSharingMaxBandwidth()

      • enableBackgroundStream

        void enableBackgroundStream(boolean enable)
        Set true to keep video stream(include local and remote) when minimize app, else will stop. Default is false. Google recommend release camera when app goes background and resume after app foreground. When you use picture-in-picture mode in app should set this method to true before call.
        Parameters:
        enable - true to keep video stream when minimize app, else will stop. Default is false.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • enableBackgroundConnection

        void enableBackgroundConnection(boolean enable)
        Set true to keep Webex server connection when minimize app. Default is false. When set to true, app will receive notifications in background, include incoming calls, messages, space updates, membership updates, etc.
        Parameters:
        enable -
        Since:
        2.8.0

      • setAdvancedSetting

        void setAdvancedSetting(AdvancedSetting setting)
        Set advanced setings for call. Only effective if set before the start of call.

        For example, Phone.setAdvancedSetting(new VideoMaxTxFPS(30));

        Since:
        2.6.0
        See Also:
        AdvancedSetting

      • getAdvancedSetting

        AdvancedSetting getAdvancedSetting(java.lang.Class<? extends AdvancedSetting> clz)
        Returns value of the advanced seting that has been set.

        For example, AdvancedSetting setting = Phone.getAdvancedSetting(VideoMaxTxFPS.class);

        Since:
        2.6.0
        See Also:
        AdvancedSetting

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Cancel the currently outgoing call that has not been connected.
        Since:
        2.6.0

      • enableAudioBNR

        void enableAudioBNR(boolean enable)
        Enable audio background noise removal. Default is false
        Parameters:
        enable - true to open audio background noise removal, else will close. Default is false.
        Since:
        2.7.0

      • isAudioBNREnable

        boolean isAudioBNREnable()
        True if audio background noise removal is open, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        true if audio background noise removal is open, otherwise false.
        Since:
        2.7.0

      • setAudioBNRMode

        void setAudioBNRMode(Phone.AudioBRNMode mode)
        Set the audio background noise removal mode, default value is Phone.AudioBRNMode.HP. This method only effective if set enableAudioBNR(boolean) to true.
        Parameters:
        mode - the audio background noise removal mode.
        Since:
        2.7.0

      • getAudioBNRMode

        Phone.AudioBRNMode getAudioBNRMode()
        Return the audio background noise removal mode.
        Returns:
        the audio background noise removal mode.
        Since:
        2.7.0
        See Also:
        Phone.AudioBRNMode

      • setVideoStreamMode

        void setVideoStreamMode(Phone.VideoStreamMode videoStreamMode)
        Set the video stream mode, default value is Phone.VideoStreamMode.COMPOSITED.
        Parameters:
        videoStreamMode - the video stream mode.
        Since:
        2.8.0

      • getVideoStreamMode

        Phone.VideoStreamMode getVideoStreamMode()
        Return the video stream mode.
        Returns:
        the video stream mode.
        Since:
        2.8.0
        See Also:

      • getServiceUrl

        java.lang.String getServiceUrl(Phone.ServiceUrlType serviceUrlType)
        Return the required service url, return null if unregistered.
        Parameters:
        serviceUrlType - the type of service url.
        Returns:
        the required service url, null if unregistered.
        Since:
        2.8.0
        See Also:
        Phone.ServiceUrlType

      • enableAskingReadPhoneStatePermission

        void enableAskingReadPhoneStatePermission(boolean enable)
        Toggle to enable or disable ask for Manifest.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE permission, true by default. When target SDK >= 30, this permission is required to check the network state, so SDK can auto-tuning performance during calls.
        Parameters:
        enable - toggle to enable or disable ask for Manifest.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE permission, true by default.
        Since:
        2.8.0
